About Me

Brad Kuhne is a SMU Fullstack Developer Bootcamp student and project manager. Mr. Kuhne is a Certified Scrum Master (CSM) and Project Management Professional (PMP). Mr. Kuhne has deep performance management, data warehouse, ERP and custom application development domain expertise garnered over a 20+ year career with Accenture, IBM, Hitachi Consulting, Saxony Partners and Dialexa. Consistently delivering high utilization while commanding premium rates with exceptional client satisfaction. Mr. Kuhne has broad industry knowledge as well as entrepreneurial experience. Mr. Kuhne earned his BBA in Finance from the Univeristy of Texa at Austin and MBA from Southern Methodist University.

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6, Node

The Portfolio Generator project is a node.js project that allows a fully-formatted webpage to be generated purely from user terminal input. The application utilized a full compliment of E6 functionality.
